title: The women killed by Jack the Ripper
itunes:title: The women killed by Jack the Ripper
itunes:subtitle: Hallie Rubenhold discusses the little-known life stories of Jack the Ripper’s five victims.
description:
Hallie Rubenhold discusses her new book The Five, which uses the untold stories of Jack the Ripper’s victims to reveal what life was like for working-class women in Victorian London.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
